message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12500. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the high worth of the product to you at $15000. We are confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.
